title: help
help.description: Show this message, or more details on a specific command.

title: donators
donators.description: List users that support Quote on Patreon.

title: quote
q
quote.description: Quote a message using a message ID or by saying a part of the message (case-insensitive), and optionally leave your own reply to a quoted message. Limited to 2 uses per 5 second time frame per channel.
examples: quote message this is my reply

title: personaladd
padd
personaladd.description: Add your personal quote, with a trigger and a response, which only you can trigger in any server. A response can be any number of attachments and/or a follow-up message after the trigger.

title: qradd
qr
qradd.description: Same as `{0}personaladd`, but instead creates a QR code based on the response of your trigger. Lesser characters - better performance; it is highly recommended to use a link shortener in your response, especially if it's a long link.

title: personalremove
premove
prem
personalremove.description: Remove your personal quote with a specified trigger.

title: personal
p
personal.description: Execute your personal quote with a chosen trigger.

title: personallist
plist
personallist.description: List your personal quotes. 10 quotes per page.

title: randquote
randquote.description: Shows a random quote from a random (or specified) category. Type `{0}randcategories` for a list of categories.

title: randcategories
randcategories.description: Shows a list of available quote categories.

title: randsubmit
randsubmit.description: Submit your own quote for a specified category. First argument is a category name, everything after it is a quote. Only works in DM channels. To prevent unwanted spam, command is limited to 5 uses within an hour per user, regardless of it's success. Limited to 5 uses per 60 minute time frame per user.
examples: randsubmit Meme This is a meme quote.

title: prefix
prefix.description: See currently set prefix, or change to a different prefix for this server.

title: delcommands
delcmds
delcommands.description: Toggle whether to automatically delete the quote command message before quoting.

title: reactions
reactions.description: Toggle whether to let users quote messages by adding :speech_balloon: reaction to them.

title: duplicate
dupe
duplicate.description: Duplicate messages from one channel to the other with a help of a webhook. First argument is the number of messages to duplicate (max 100), second argument is the channel to duplicate messages from, third argument is the target channels to duplicate messages to (defaults to current). User requires `Manage Server` permission to execute. Limited to 2 uses per 30 second time frame per server.

title: pinchannel
pinc
pinchannel.description: Set a channel that will be used for pinning messages. Members with Manage Messages permission can react with :pushpin: to pin a message.

title: snipe
snipe.description: Snipe the last deleted message from a specified channel. Defaults to current channel.

title: lookup
lookup.description: Look up general information about a Discord invite URL/code.

title: snowflake
snowflake.description: Gets the creation date and time of the specified Discord snowflake (ID).
